title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Research Policy and Programmes
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Research Policy and Programmes 
(Transfer of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited research policy programme (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: (2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2021.
text_raw:
2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2021.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, on and after the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department higher education research innovation science (2) reference department enterprise trade employment contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment – 

(a) by or under the Industrial Development (Science Foundation 

Ireland) Act 2003 (No. 30 of 2003), 

(b) by section 9B (inserted by section 37(1)(b) of the Industrial 
Development (Forfás Dissolution) Act 2014 (No. 13 of 2014)) of 
the Industrial Development Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993), and 

(c) 

in relation to the programme known as the Programme for 
Research in Third Level Institutions, 

are transferred to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, on and after the commencement of 
this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [586] 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science, the name of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science shall, in so far as the 
proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in the 
proceedings for that of the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment or 
added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not 
abate by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister enterprise trade employment party proceeding reference function transferred order minister higher education research innovation science name minister higher education research innovation science shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister enterprise trade employment added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment may, 
in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, be carried on 
or completed on or after such commencement by the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister enterprise trade employment may far relates function transferred order minister higher education research innovation science carried completed commencement minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect on and 
after such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
contained in the memorandum and articles of association of any company and 
relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, on and after the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 7 reference minister enterprise trade employment contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred on the commencement to the Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science and, accordingly, without any 
further conveyance, transfer or assignment – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, real and personal, vests in the Minister for Further 
and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science by this Article 
which, on the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [586] 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment shall on the request of the 
Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment be transferred into the name of 
the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and 
Science. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
